verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> I Heard <S%G191><s%> A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Loud <S%G3173><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple, <S%G3485><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Angels, <S%G32><s%> Go, <S%G5217><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Pour Out <S%G1632><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bowls <S%G5357><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Fury <S%G2372><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth. <S%G1093><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Departed <S%G565><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> First, <S%G4413><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Poured Out <S%G1632><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5357><s%> His Bowl <S%G846><s%> On To <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth; <S%G1093><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Came <S%G1096><s%> A Sore, <S%G1668><s%> Evil <S%G2556><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Grievous, <S%G4190><s%> Upon <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Had <S%G2192><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mark <S%G5480><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Beast, <S%G2342><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1504><s%> To His Image <S%G846><s%> Doing Homage. <S%G4352><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Second <S%G1208><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Poured Out <S%G1632><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5357><s%> His Bowl <S%G846><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea; <S%G2281><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> It Became <S%G1096><s%> Blood, <S%G129><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Of One Dead : <S%G3498><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Soul <S%G5590><s%> Living <S%G2198><s%> Died <S%G599><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea. <S%G2281><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Third <S%G5154><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Poured Out <S%G1632><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5357><s%> His Bowl <S%G846><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Rivers, <S%G4215><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fountains <S%G4077><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Waters; <S%G5204><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Became <S%G1096><s%> Blood. <S%G129><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Heard <S%G191><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Waters <S%G5204><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Righteous, <S%G1342><s%> , O Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Art Thou, <S%G1488><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Art <S%G5607><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Wast <S%G2258><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Holy One, <S%G3741><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> Thou Didst Judge; <S%G2919><s%>

Because The <S%G3754><s%> Blood <S%G129><s%> Of Saints <S%G40><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Prophets <S%G4396><s%> They Poured Out, <S%G1632><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Blood <S%G129><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> Thou Didst Give <S%G1325><s%> To Drink; <S%G4095><s%> Worthy <S%G514><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Thy Are. <S%G1526><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Heard <S%G191><s%> Another <S%G243><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Alter <S%G2379><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Yea, <S%G3483><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Almighty, <S%G3841><s%> True <S%G228><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Righteous <S%G1342><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2920><s%> Are Thy Judgments. <S%G4675><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fourth <S%G5067><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Poured Out <S%G1632><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5357><s%> His Bowl <S%G846><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sun; <S%G2246><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> It Was Given <S%G1325><s%> To It <S%G846><s%> To Scorch <S%G2739><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Fire. <S%G4442><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Were Scorched <S%G2739><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> With Heat <S%G2738><s%> Great, <S%G3173><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Blasphemed <S%G987><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Name <S%G3686><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Who Has <S%G2192><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> Over <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4127><s%> These Plagues, <S%G3778><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Did Not Repent <S%G3340><s%> To Give <S%G1325><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Glory. <S%G1391><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fifth <S%G3991><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Poured Out <S%G1632><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5357><s%> His Bowl <S%G846><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Throne <S%G2362><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Beast; <S%G2342><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Became <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G932><s%> Its Kingdom <S%G846><s%> Darkened; <S%G4656><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Were Gnawing <S%G3145><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1100><s%> Their Tongues <S%G846><s%> For <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Distress, <S%G4192><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Blasphemed <S%G987><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> For <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Distresses <S%G4192><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> For <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1668><s%> Their Sores, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Did Not Repent <S%G3340><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Works <S%G2041><s%> Their. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sixth <S%G1623><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Poured Out <S%G1632><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5357><s%> His Bowl <S%G846><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> River <S%G4215><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Great, <S%G3173><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Euphrates; <S%G2166><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Dried Up <S%G3583><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Water <S%G5204><s%> Its, <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Might Be Prepared <S%G2090><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Way <S%G3598><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Kings <S%G935><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Rising <S%G395><s%> Of The Sun. <S%G2246><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Saw <S%G1492><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mouth <S%G4750><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Dragon, <S%G1404><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mouth <S%G4750><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Beast, <S%G2342><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mouth <S%G4750><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> False Prophet, <S%G5578><s%> Spirits <S%G4151><s%> Three <S%G5140><s%> Unclean <S%G169><s%> Like <S%G3664><s%> Frogs; <S%G944><s%>

<S%G1526><s%> For They Are <S%G1063><s%> Spirits <S%G4151><s%> Of Demons <S%G1142><s%> Doing <S%G4160><s%> Signs, <S%G4592><s%> To Go Forth <S%G1607><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kings <S%G935><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Habitable World <S%G3625><s%> Whole <S%G3650><s%> To Gather Together <S%G4863><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Unto <S%G1519><s%> Battle <S%G4171><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Day <S%G2250><s%> That <S%G1565><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Almighty. <S%G3841><s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I Come <S%G2064><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> A Thief. <S%G2812><s%> Blessed Is <S%G3107><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Watches, <S%G1127><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Keeps <S%G5083><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2440><s%> His Garments, <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Naked <S%G1131><s%> He May Walk, <S%G4043><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They See <S%G991><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G808><s%> His Shame. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Gathered Together <S%G4863><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Place <S%G5117><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Is Called <S%G2564><s%> In Hebrew <S%G1447><s%> Armageddon. <S%G717><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seventh <S%G1442><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Poured Out <S%G1632><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5357><s%> His Bowl <S%G846><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Air; <S%G109><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Come Out <S%G1831><s%> A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Loud <S%G3173><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple <S%G3485><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> , Heaven, <S%G3772><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Throne <S%G2362><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> It Is Done. <S%G1096><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> There Were <S%G1096><s%> Voices <S%G5456><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thunders <S%G1027><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lightnings; <S%G796><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Earthquake <S%G4578><s%> There Was <S%G1096><s%> A Great, <S%G3173><s%> Such As <S%G3634><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Was Not <S%G1096><s%> ' <S%G575><s%> Since <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> Were <S%G1096><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> So Mighty <S%G5082><s%> An Earthquake, <S%G4578><s%> So <S%G3779><s%> Great. <S%G3173><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Became <S%G1096><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Three <S%G5140><s%> Parts; <S%G3313><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cities <S%G4172><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Nations <S%G1484><s%> Fell; <S%G4098><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Babylon <S%G897><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> Was Remembered <S%G3415><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> To Give <S%G1325><s%> Her <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cup <S%G4221><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Wine <S%G3631><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Fury <S%G2372><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Wrath <S%G3709><s%> Of His. <S%G846><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Island <S%G3520><s%> Fled; <S%G5343><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Mountains <S%G3735><s%> No <S%G3756><s%> Were Found; <S%G2147><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> A Hail <S%G5464><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Of A Talent Weight <S%G5006><s%> Comes Down <S%G2597><s%> Out <S%G1537><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Men; <S%G444><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Blasphemed <S%G987><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> Because <S%G1537><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Plague <S%G4127><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Hail, <S%G5464><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4127><s%> Its Plague <S%G846><s%> Exceeding. <S%G4970><s%>
